main.name: Ethan Ng
main.description: Currently searching for a career in the software industry
main.bio: Volleyball and Badminton enthusiast, avid gamer, and lover of all things motorsports. I'm at the beginning of my software career and have the drive to compete with the best and brightest in this competitive industry. I have the most experience in Full Stack development with the MERN stack but I'm constantly learning and willing to learn new technologies. Please feel free to reach out to me if you have any questions!
main.contactmessage: Like what you see or have questions for me? Send me an email or reach out to me over phone!

resume.skillmessage: Some of the skills I've acquired over the years.

education.degree: Bachelor of Engineering Science, Software Engineering Specialization
education.description: Some relevant courses: Object Oriented Design, Database Management Systems, Web technologies.

work.title: Software Development Engineer Intern
work.description: Worked on the Tax Service team doing feature development for internal processes • Developed a React front-end service which provided greater visibility and maintainability of tax data structures using a Serverless Application Model by taking advantage of AWS Lambda, DynamoDB, Cognito, and API Gateway as the backend • Full product ownership from design to deployment of service

work.title: ATB 101 Student - Operations Support
work.description: Part of the Operations Support team working primarily on process automation to improve internal workflow efficiency • Implemented projects and scripts primarily in Google Script for repetitive workflows in teams to create time savings of up to an hour per person on the process • Collaborated closely with banking process stakeholder in an agile development environment to define project needs and specifications

projects.title: Web Application - Music Reviews
projects.category: (Local school project) Web app with major web tech functionality implemented

projects.title: Realistic Racing Game
projects.category: Game which simulates physics of a moving vehicle in the unity engine.
